item.description:
The Nimrod is a great little Gem in Falmouth. It is a 200+ Year old Inn with a rich history. It even has a hole in a wall from being hit by a cannonball from a British ship during the war of 1812.

On Monday nights they have band playing called the Joe Sutton Band. They play a great mix of unamplified (great for a monday night) acoustic, folk and blues. It's a very relaxed atmosphere with soft lighting, great food, and excellent service. I've been a few times and it's a wonderful way to end the worst day of the week.

Oh yeah there is no cover.....
item.how_to_find_us: Big Red Head guy with a Goatee

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Acoustic Folky Blues at the Nimrod in Falmouth
